campaigns.cmpTitle: Help Himmatbhai In His Mission To Educate Hundreds Of Underprivileged Women & Children
campaigns.cmpDesc: Pochabhai Foundation looks after the educational and nutritional needs of underprivileged and marginalized children and women. You can support them and help uplift countless people in India.

myDonations.cmpTitle: Help Himmatbhai In His Mission To Educate Hundreds Of Underprivileged Women & Children

timeline.desc: INR 6800 from your donation has been used to purchase a black board for Government Secondary School, Khambhat, Anand, Gujarat.
INR 4350 from your donation has been used to purchase text books for 12 girl students of 8th grade.
We received your donation. Thank you so much for the donation
Amount successfully received by CharityZ. Thanks for the donation!
